00001 #include "dspMatrix.h"

00003 /* Note:  also used for lspMatrix */
00004 SEXP dspMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00005 {
00006     SEXP val = symmetricMatrix_validate(obj);
00007     if(isString(val))
00008         return(val);
00009     else { /* identical to the test in dtpMatrix_validate() : */
00010         int d = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym))[0],
00011             lx = length(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym));
00012         if(lx * 2 != d*(d+1))
00013             return(mkString(_("Incorrect length of 'x' slot")));
00014         return ScalarLogical(1);
00015     }
00016 }

00018 double get_norm_sp(SEXP obj, const char *typstr)
00019 {
00020     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00021     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00022     double *work = (double *) NULL;
00023 
00024     typnm[0] = La_norm_type(typstr);
00025     if (*typnm == 'I' || *typnm == 'O') {
00026         work = (double *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(double));
00027     }
00028     return F77_CALL(dlansp)(typnm, uplo_P(obj), dims,
00029                             REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)), work);
00030 }
00031 
00032 SEXP dspMatrix_norm(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00033 {
00034     return ScalarReal(get_norm_sp(obj, CHAR(asChar(type))));
00035 }

00037 SEXP dspMatrix_rcond(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00038 {
00039     SEXP trf = dspMatrix_trf(obj);
00040     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00041     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00042     double anorm = get_norm_sp(obj, "O"), rcond;
00043 
00044     typnm[0] = La_rcond_type(CHAR(asChar(type)));
00045     F77_CALL(dspcon)(uplo_P(trf), dims,
00046                      REAL   (GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_xSym)),
00047                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00048                      &anorm, &rcond,
00049                      (double *) R_alloc(2*dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00050                      (int *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(int)), &info);
00051     return ScalarReal(rcond);
00052 }

00054 SEXP dspMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00055 {
00056     SEXP trf = dspMatrix_trf(a);
00057     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dspMatrix")));
00058     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00059 
00060     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_uploSym);
00061     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_xSym);
00062     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_DimSym);
00063     F77_CALL(dsptri)(uplo_P(val), dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)),
00064                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00065                      (double *) R_alloc((long) dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00066                      &info);
00067     UNPROTECT(1);
00068     return val;
00069 }
00070 
00071 SEXP dspMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00072 {
00073     SEXP trf = dspMatrix_trf(a),
00074         val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00075     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00076         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00077     int n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1], info;
00078 
00079     if (adims[0] != n || nrhs < 1 || n < 1)
00080         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00081     F77_CALL(dsptrs)(uplo_P(trf),
00082                      &n, &nrhs, REAL(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_xSym)),
00083                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00084                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &n, &info);
00085     UNPROTECT(1);
00086     return val;
00087 }
00088 
00089 SEXP dspMatrix_as_dsyMatrix(SEXP from)
00090 {
00091     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dsyMatrix"))),
00092         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00093         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym),
00094         dmnP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00095     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00096 
00097     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00098     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dmnP));
00099     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00100     packed_to_full_double(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, n*n)),
00101                           REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00102                           *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);
00103     UNPROTECT(1);
00104     return val;
00105 }

00107 SEXP dspMatrix_matrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00108 {
00109     SEXP val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00110     int *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00111     int i, ione = 1, n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1];
00112     const char *uplo = uplo_P(a);
00113     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), one = 1., zero = 0.,
00114         *vx = REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym));
00115     double *bx = Alloca(n * nrhs, double);
00116     R_CheckStack();
00117 
00118     Memcpy(bx, vx, n * nrhs);
00119     if (bdims[0] != n)
00120         error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00121     if (nrhs < 1 || n < 1) {
00122 /*      error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied")); */
00123     } else
00124         for (i = 0; i < nrhs; i++)
00125             F77_CALL(dspmv)(uplo, &n, &one, ax, bx + i * n, &ione,
00126                             &zero, vx + i * n, &ione);
00127     UNPROTECT(1);
00128     return val;
00129 }
00130 
00131 SEXP dspMatrix_trf(SEXP x)
00132 {
00133     SEXP val = get_factors(x, "pBunchKaufman"),
00134         dimP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym),
00135         uploP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_uploSym);
00136     int *dims = INTEGER(dimP), *perm, info;
00137     int n = dims[0];
00138     const char *uplo = CHAR(STRING_ELT(uploP, 0));
00139 
00140     if (val != R_NilValue) return val;
00141     dims = INTEGER(dimP);
00142     val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("pBunchKaufman")));
00143     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uploP));
00144     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00145     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00146     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_xSym);
00147     perm = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, n));
00148     F77_CALL(dsptrf)(uplo, dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), perm, &info);
00149     if (info) error(_("Lapack routine %s returned error code %d"), "dsptrf", info);
00150     UNPROTECT(1);
00151     return set_factors(x, val, "pBunchKaufman");
00152 }
